results.title: Wunderlich syndrome during antiplatelet drug therapy.
results.text_hl: His current therapy included @CHEMICAL_Aspirin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001241 @@@acetylsalicylic acid@@@ (100 mg/daily) and @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ (20 mg/ daily).
